body:
Hey Hey!

Me and Sunrise just prestiged, I'm still stuck with 9th. However, Sunrise has accomplished his goal on being the first person to get prestige 15 on Nebula.

Congratulations!

-http://prntscr.com/5eitn7(Prestige Messages)
-http://prntscr.com/5eiwsp (Prestige 15 color and shape)

reply_to.body_tagged: Yes, but that's exactly like saying "No offence, but.." yet it's still quite offensive.

replies.body:
Devoid of any bad intentions, I'm rolling with Juano and his bandwagon... naively allotting that much energy and devotion to a Minecraft server — not to mention the inhumane number of hours spent playing — is unhealthy, to say the least. Unless you were absolutely certain that wasting all day on a trivial video game was the most beneficial thing you could do with your time and resources, I wouldn't recommend even considering it. Of course, I'm all for liberation, so do whatever makes you happy; I can't force any of my beliefs onto you, but I can surely give you my best advice.

That's also what Juano was doing before Peachy censured him: it's an irrefutable fact that someone who manages to reach fifteenth prestige in one month is dedicating too much time to their endeavor. People deserve freedom, sure, but a friendly suggestion to slow down won't hurt. In fact, I've lost countless friends who've festered into worthless degenerates because no one told them that doing drugs was deleterious to their health. Similarly, it's wrong to admonish someone for exercising their rights and offering a passive opinion on how long someone gazes at a computer monitor.

TL;DR: I also think Sunrise is spending way too much time playing on the server and should consider toning down a bit. Because of the context, I don't think Peachy should encourage people to continue wasting their time on something this meaningless.

On a more positive note... congratulations, you two! Seeing a different prestige symbol by Sunrise's name every encounter was always pretty amusing; too bad that won't be the case anymore...

Guys stop complaining about Sunny's life or discussing in this thread and let's see the good side, tell him Gratz because I know play much hour is unhealthy but don't be like this. See the good side on this, be optimistic. 

Congratulations Sunny! Well deserved! :D
